Tailwind

February 24, 2026

https://tailwindcss.com/docs/installation/framework-guides/nextjs

Tailwind CSS Cheatsheet

A practical reference for common Tailwind CSS utility classes (Tailwind v3+).

1. Layout

Container

<div class="container mx-auto px-4"></div>

Display

block | inline-block | inline | flex | inline-flex | grid | hidden

<div class="flex"></div>
<div class="grid"></div>

Position

static | relative | absolute | fixed | sticky

<div class="relative">
  <div class="absolute top-0 right-0"></div>
</div>

Z-Index

<div class="z-10"></div>

2. Flexbox

Direction & Wrap

<div class="flex flex-row flex-wrap"></div>
<div class="flex flex-col"></div>

Align Items / Justify

<div class="items-start items-center items-end"></div>
<div class="justify-start justify-center justify-between justify-end"></div>

Gap

<div class="gap-2 gap-4 gap-8"></div>

Flex Sizing

<div class="flex-1"></div>
<div class="flex-none"></div>
<div class="grow"></div>
<div class="shrink-0"></div>

3. Grid

Columns / Rows

<div class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3"></div>
<div class="grid grid-rows-2"></div>

Spans

<div class="col-span-2 row-span-2"></div>

Gap

<div class="gap-4"></div>

4. Spacing

Padding / Margin

<div class="p-4 px-6 py-2"></div>
<div class="m-4 mx-auto my-2"></div>

Space Between (children)

<div class="space-y-4"></div>
<div class="space-x-2"></div>

5. Sizing

Width / Height

<div class="w-full h-screen"></div>
<div class="w-64 h-48"></div>
<div class="min-h-screen"></div>
<div class="max-w-3xl"></div>

Aspect Ratio

<div class="aspect-video"></div>

6. Typography

Font Size / Weight

<p class="text-sm text-base text-lg text-xl text-2xl"></p>
<p class="font-normal font-medium font-semibold font-bold"></p>

Line Height / Tracking

<p class="leading-tight leading-normal leading-relaxed"></p>
<p class="tracking-tight tracking-wide"></p>

Alignment

<p class="text-left text-center text-right"></p>

Text Transform

<p class="uppercase lowercase capitalize"></p>

Truncation

<p class="truncate"></p>
<p class="line-clamp-2"></p>

7. Colors

Text / Background

<div class="text-gray-900 bg-gray-100"></div>
<div class="text-white bg-blue-600"></div>

Opacity

<div class="bg-black/50"></div>
<div class="text-white/80"></div>

8. Borders & Radius

Border

<div class="border border-gray-200"></div>
<div class="border-t border-b"></div>

Radius

<div class="rounded rounded-md rounded-lg rounded-xl rounded-2xl"></div>
<div class="rounded-full"></div>

9. Shadows

<div class="shadow shadow-md shadow-lg shadow-xl"></div>

10. Backgrounds

Gradients

<div class="bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-500 via-purple-500 to-pink-500"></div>

Background Image / Cover

<div class="bg-cover bg-center"></div>

11. Effects

Opacity

<div class="opacity-0 opacity-50 opacity-100"></div>

Blur

<div class="blur-sm blur-md blur-lg"></div>

12. Transitions & Animation

Transition

<button class="transition duration-200 ease-in-out hover:scale-105"></button>

Common

<div class="transition-colors"></div>
<div class="transition-transform"></div>

13. Hover / Focus / Active

<button class="bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400 active:scale-95">
  Button
</button>

14. Responsive Breakpoints

sm: 640px
md: 768px
lg: 1024px
xl: 1280px
2xl: 1536px

Example:

<div class="p-2 md:p-6 lg:p-10"></div>

15. Dark Mode

<div class="bg-white text-gray-900 dark:bg-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100"></div>

16. State Variants

hover: focus: active: disabled:
first: last: odd: even:
peer-*, group-*

Group Hover

<div class="group">
  <span class="group-hover:underline">Hover parent</span>
</div>

Peer

<input class="peer" />
<p class="hidden peer-focus:block">Shows on focus</p>

17. Forms

<input class="w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-400" />

18. Common UI Patterns

Card

<div class="rounded-2xl border border-gray-200 bg-white p-6 shadow-md">
  <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold">Title</h3>
  <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-600">Body text</p>
</div>

Button

<button class="inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md bg-blue-600 px-4 py-2 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 active:scale-95 transition">
  Click
</button>

Input + Label

<label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Email</label>
<input class="mt-1 w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2" />

19. Customization

Arbitrary Values

<div class="w-[420px] top-[3.25rem] bg-[#0f172a]"></div>

Extend in tailwind.config

// theme.extend: colors, spacing, fonts, etc.

20. Gotchas & Tips

  • Prefer gap-* over margins for spacing in flex/grid.
  • Use container mx-auto for centered layouts.
  • Use prose (Typography plugin) for rich text.
  • Use clsx/cn helper for conditional classes.

Tip: Build by composing utilities; extract components when repetition shows up.
